sentence: A stunning $135.8 million came from Friends of Ron DeSantis, his independent political committee, and the remainder stems from his official reelection campaign: Florida Governor Fundraising: May 1.
author: Hannah Bleau
title: Democrat Opponents Fail to Come Close to Ron DeSantiss $143 Million War Chest
